dcterms:description: The VisDial v1.0 dataset consists of images with dialog histories containing question-answer pairs. It is designed for visual dialog tasks where an agent must answer questions based on an image and previous dialog context.
dcterms:title: VisDial v1.0

dcterms:creator: C. Hori

dcterms:description: The Audio Visual Scene-aware Dialog dataset is designed for dialog tasks that involve both audio and visual inputs, allowing for multimodal interactions in dialog systems.
dcterms:title: Audio Visual Scene-aware Dialog

dcterms:creator: R. Krishna
Y. Zhu
O. Groth
J. Johnson

S. Chen

dcterms:description: Visual Genome is a dataset that connects language and vision through dense image annotations, providing a rich source of information for various vision-language tasks.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
H. Fang
T. Y. Lin
R. Vedantam

P. Doll√°r
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: COCO Captions is a dataset for image captioning that provides a large collection of images with corresponding textual descriptions, facilitating the development of models for generating captions.
dcterms:title: COCO Captions

dcterms:creator: S. Kottur
J. M. Moura
D. Parikh
D. Batra
M. Rohrbach
dcterms:description: CLEVR-Dialog is a diagnostic dataset designed for multi-round reasoning in visual dialog, providing a structured environment for evaluating dialog systems.
dcterms:title: CLEVR-Dialog

dcterms:creator: H. De Vries
F. Strub
S. Chandar
O. Pietquin
H. Larochelle
A. Courville
dcterms:description: GuessWhat?! is a dataset for visual object discovery through multi-modal dialogue, where agents ask questions to identify objects in images.
dcterms:title: GuessWhat?!
